Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Conformance Twin and Anti-Fraud Agent modules

Conformance Twin \(process_mining.py\):
- Add Pydantic models: SOPSchema, SOPActivity, ConformanceResult
- Implement conformance_twin_analysis\(\) for DFG vs SOP comparison
- Include LOAN_APPROVAL_SOP with 7 activities and timing constraints
- Detect missing activities, sequence violations, timing breaches

Anti-Fraud Agent \(anti_fraud_agent.py\):
- New AML/APU-PPT module per Indonesian regulations \(POJK 12/2017\)
- Detect structuring, rapid movement, velocity anomalies
- Detect large cash \(>IDR 500M\), high-risk jurisdictions
- SAR narrative generation with LLM integration
- Pydantic models for all inputs/outputs

Tests:
- 15 tests for conformance twin functionality
- 22 tests for anti-fraud agent detection rules

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
